articles.title: The Supreme Court Just Rolled Democracy Back. You Can Measure How Much. - POLITICO
articles.description: After last Friday, 14 million more Americans will be living under laws they disagree with. How did we get here?
articles.content:
One significant result is easy to see on maps: The United States is becoming more polarized, with a red America and blue America clearly emerging.

articles.title: Heart disease: The 'essential' activity for 'ideal' heart health - It's not exercise - Express
articles.description: AS HEART disease is considered one of the biggest killers globally, the American Heart Association put together a checklist of factors for optimal heart health. However, a new activity has been now added as it's thought to be 'essential' for the organ.
